newsitem.title: USA: Showers likely through weekend in W Europe - WSC.
newsitem.headline: Showers likely through weekend in W Europe - WSC.

text.p: Showery weather will probably last through the coming weekend in much of western Europe, independent forecaster Weather Services Corp said on Friday.
Showers early in the period in eastern Europe will give way to drying and warming. Similar conditions are expected in the western former Soviet Union as it warms up over the weekend into next week.
